mapper.select: SELECT clas_id,count(clas_id) AS s FROM xl_clas GROUP BY clas_id
mapper.insert: insert into xl_clas (id, stu_name, school_id, clas_id, homework, simulation, Unified, proposition, paper, create_id, create_date, update_id, update_date, enable_flag) values (#{id}, #{stuName}, #{schoolId}, #{clasId}, #{homework}, #{simulation}, #{unified}, #{proposition}, #{paper}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{updateId}, #{updateDate}, #{enableFlag})
